response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, reflecting years of innovation and expertise. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $15,000, which we believe is a fair reflection of its true worth and the benefits it can bring to you. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will be investing in a solution that promises to exceed your expectations in terms of functionality, reliability, and long-term value. Thank you for considering our proposal. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 15000}
